name: convertx
description: ConvertX is a self-hosted web video converter utility that allows users to upload media files and convert them to different formats using FFmpeg, through a graphical UI for ease of use.
features: Video Conversion: Transform media files between formats using FFmpeg. Professional quality output.
Web Interface: Upload and convert files through simple browser UI. No command-line needed.
Multiple Formats: Support for all major video and audio formats. Universal compatibility.
Batch Processing: Convert multiple files simultaneously. Save time on large collections.
Self-Hosted: Process sensitive media files on your own server. Complete privacy control.
Easy Setup: Simple deployment with minimal configuration. Start converting in minutes.
